title: Zayn Malik's New Music and Tour
summary: Zayn Malik, a singer from the band One Direction, has announced a new album called Konnakol and a world tour. He released a song called Die For Me, which is about asking someone to stay. The album title Konnakol means making drum sounds with your voice, a style from South Indian music. Zayn has used South Asian influences before, like singing in Urdu. Fans are excited to hear the new music and see him on tour. Other former One Direction singers like Harry Styles and Louis Tomlinson are also releasing music, and Niall Horan has a new song too.

WHAT: Zayn announced a new album called Konnakol and a world tour, released a song Die For Me, and uses South Indian music influences.
WHERE: The music styles come from South India, and Zayn is from Bradford, but the tour is worldwide.
